info.title: Contract Accounting Tax Determination Code
info.description: Retrieve a list of tax determination codes. Read configuration settings for a tax determination code in Contract Accounting.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve a tax determination code in Contract Accounting (FI-CA) from your SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Contract Accounting Master Data Integration(SAP_COM_0167)
